CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 12, 1959, pg. A3 reads: "Hill City Committee - This Hill City group helped with the "Back-to-School" festivities, which saw the youngsters, parents and friends moving from one recreation spot to another at an appointed time, last Friday night. On this committee were, front row, left to right: Regina McCoy, vice president; Bernie Nelson, Viola Goodlowe, Bertha Davis, Marion Johnson, Virginia Hainesworth, Mary Brooks and Janet Phipps.  Back row: Mildred Williams, Hazel Mayo, secretary; Russell Shelton, manager, Bedford Dwellings; Harold Griffin, director, Hill City, and Harry Bray, director, Soho Community House."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of "Back-to-School Festival" Hill City committee members, from left, first row, Regina McCoy, Bernie Nelson, Viola Goodlowe, Bertha Davis, Marion Johnson, Virginia Hainesworth, Mary Brooks, and Janet Phipps; back row: Mildred Williams, Hazel Mayo, Russell Shelton, Harold Griffin, and Harry Bray, posed in Hill City
